trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> with the associated database.
trans-unit.target: Gera automaticamente os comandos de tabela única que são usados para reconciliar as alterações feitas em um <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> com o banco de dados associado.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with the associated data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>não gera automaticamente as instruções SQL necessárias para reconciliar as alterações feitas em um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>com a fonte de dados associado.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create an OleDbCommandBuilder object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode criar um objeto OleDbCommandBuilder para gerar automaticamente instruções SQL para atualizações de tabela única se você definir a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the OleDbCommandBuilder.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, qualquer instrução SQL adicional que você não defina é geradas pelo OleDbCommandBuilder.

trans-unit.source: The OleDbCommandBuilder registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events whenever you set the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O OleDbCommandBuilder se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos sempre que você definir o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: You can only associate one <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> or OleDbCommandBuilder object with each other at one time.
trans-unit.target: Você só pode associar um <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>ou objeto de OleDbCommandBuilder entre si de uma só vez.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the OleDbCommandBuilder uses the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar instruções INSERT, UPDATE ou DELETE, o OleDbCommandBuilder usa o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade para recuperar um conjunto necessário de metadados automaticamente.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> after the metadata is retrieved, such as after the first update, you should call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> method to update the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Se você alterar o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>depois que os metadados são recuperados, como após a primeira atualização, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>método para atualizar os metadados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OleDbCommandBuilder also uses the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O OleDbCommandBuilder também usa o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>e as <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Transaction%2A>Propriedades referenciadas por <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> itself is replaced.
trans-unit.target: O usuário deve chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se uma ou mais dessas propriedades são modificadas, ou se o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>será substituído.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> properties retain their previous values.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>Propriedades retêm os valores anteriores.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, the OleDbCommandBuilder is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Se você chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, o OleDbCommandBuilder seja desassociado do <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>, e os comandos gerados não são mais usados.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder"></xref> class with the associated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe com associada <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>especificado nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma nova instância <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>associado a esta <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>é liberado.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"></xref> object for which SQL statements are automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto para o qual o SQL instruções são geradas automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>especificado nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma nova instância <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>associado a esta <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>é liberado.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> and populates the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*> collection of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera informações de parâmetro do procedimento armazenado especificado no <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> e preenche o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*>coleção especificada <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters overwrites any existing parameter information for the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters substitui quaisquer informações de parâmetro existentes para <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: DeriveParameters requires an additional call to the data source to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: DeriveParameters requer uma chamada adicional para a fonte de dados para obter as informações.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Se as informações de parâmetro são conhecidas antecipadamente, é mais eficiente para preencher a coleção de parâmetros definindo explicitamente as informações.

trans-unit.source: You can only use DeriveParameters with stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Você só pode usar DeriveParameters com procedimentos armazenados.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use DeriveParameters to populate the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection> with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode usar DeriveParameters para preencher o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection>com arbitrárias instruções Transact-SQL, como uma instrução SELECT com parâmetros.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Configurando parâmetros e tipos de dados do parâmetro](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> referenciando o procedimento armazenado do qual as informações de parâmetro são derivada.

trans-unit.source: The derived parameters are added to the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*> collection of the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros derivados são adicionados para o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*>coleção do <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: The underlying OLE DB provider does not support returning stored procedure parameter information, the command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandType*> specified was not <xref uid="langword_csharp_StoredProcedure" name="StoredProcedure" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O provedor OLE DB subjacente não oferece suporte a retornar informações de parâmetro de procedimento armazenado, o texto do comando não é um nome válido de procedimento armazenado, ou o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandType*>especificado não estava <xref uid="langword_csharp_StoredProcedure" name="StoredProcedure" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões na fonte de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetDeleteCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o método GetDeleteCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetDeleteCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetDeleteCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetDeleteCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetDeleteCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetDeleteCommand will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, será o GetDeleteCommand estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetDeleteCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetDeleteCommand.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões na fonte de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>como a base de um comando modificado.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>e modifique o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>será ainda estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite que você force a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>para gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas: - o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>for especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para executar as inserções na fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetInsertCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o método GetInsertCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque ele retorna o texto do <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetInsertCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetInsertCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetInsertCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetInsertCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetInsertCommand will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, será o GetInsertCommand estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetInsertCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetInsertCommand.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar as inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para executar as inserções na fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>método para solução de problemas ou informativas fins porque retorna o texto do <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>como a base de um comando modificado.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>e modifique o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>será ainda estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite que você force a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>para gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas: - o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>for especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar as inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates at the data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar atualizações na fonte de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetUpdateCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o método GetUpdateCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetUpdateCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetUpdateCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetUpdateCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetUpdateCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetUpdateCommand will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, será o GetUpdateCommand estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetUpdateCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetUpdateCommand.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para executar atualizações.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates at the data source, optionally using columns for parameter names.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar atualizações na fonte de dados, opcionalmente usando colunas para nomes de parâmetro de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>como a base de um comando modificado.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>e modifique o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>será ainda estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite que você force a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>para gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas: - o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>foi especificado e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>expressão regular.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>for especificado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna, se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para executar atualizações.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador sem aspas no caso de catálogo correto, retorna o correto entre aspas a forma de identificador.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui escape corretamente quaisquer aspas inseridas no identificador.

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador sem aspas original.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A versão entre aspas do identificador.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
trans-unit.target: As aspas inseridas dentro do identificador corretamente são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador sem aspas no caso de catálogo correto, retorna o correto entre aspas a forma de identificador.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui escape corretamente quaisquer aspas inseridas no identificador.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier to be returned in quoted format.
trans-unit.target: O identificador sem aspas a ser retornado em formato entre aspas.

trans-unit.source: When a connection is passed, causes the managed wrapper to get the quote character from the OLE DB provider.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma conexão for passado, faz com que o wrapper gerenciado obter o caractere de aspas do provedor OLE DB.

trans-unit.source: When no connection is passed, the string is quoted using values from <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix*> and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando nenhuma conexão é passado, a cadeia de caracteres está entre aspas usando valores de <> </> *> e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A versão entre aspas do identificador.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
trans-unit.target: As aspas inseridas dentro do identificador corretamente são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador entre aspas, retorna a forma sem aspas correta do identificador.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui corretamente sem escape qualquer inseridos aspas no identificador.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: O identificador que terá seus removidas as aspas inseridas.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes correctly un-escaped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador sem aspas, com aspas inseridas corretamente sem escape.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador entre aspas, retorna a forma sem aspas correta do identificador.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui corretamente sem escape qualquer inseridos aspas no identificador.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: O identificador que terá seus removidas as aspas inseridas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes correctly un-escaped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador sem aspas, com aspas inseridas corretamente sem escape.
